lyrics:

does it feel so bad

and when youre looking at the world
through dying eyes
when you stare at it dead
and youre giving it head
and all those things you say you love
never come alive
oh yeah

when youre getting so low
and i know youve been
feeling like a driedout leaf
in a summer breeze
i dont like it
